place.placeName: Qǝddǝst Maryam Ḥarennät Gäbäzäyti / Ḥarennät Maryam
place.settlement: wäräda Ganta ʾAfäšum, ṭabiya Sasun Bet Ḥawaryat, qušät Sasun

note.ab: Däbr. The church of ʿAddigodana Täklä Haymanot, in the vicinity, was historically associated with Ḥarennät Maryam (but recently became an independent institution). A ṣäbäl-source is located near ʿAddigodana Täklä Haymanot; near the source, there are ruins of the "old church of Täklä Haymanot".

22 Mss. photographed: MHG-001 "The Vita of Täklä Haymanot"; MHG-002 "The Homily of St. Michael"; MHG-003 "The Vita of Mänfäs Qǝddus"; MHG-004 "Four Gospels"; MHG-005 "The Homily of St. Michael"; MHG-006 "The Book of the Epistle"; MHG-007 "Pauline Epistles"; MHG-008 "The Book of the Funeral Rite"; MHG-009 "The Book of the Chants"; MHG-010 "Collection of Marian prayers"; MHG-011 "Missal"; MHG-012 "Miracles of Mary"; MHG-013 "The Book of the Mistery"; MHG-014 "Miracles of Mary"; MHG-015 "The Book of the Baptismal Rite"; MHG-016 "The Homiliy of the Saviour of the world"; MHG-017 "Missal"; MHG-018 "Four Gospels"; MHG-019 "The Prayer of the Incense"; MHG-020 "Pauline Epistles"; MHG-021 "Miracles of Mary, other texts"; MHG-022 "1. The Book of Gǝṣṣǝw; 2. The Homily of the Sabbath of Christians"
Tabots of Trinity, ʾArägawi, Mary, George, ʾAbrǝha and ʾAṣbǝḥa, Peter and Paul (some of them are said to be marble tabots).
